text: Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist at first. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Mist later. Force 2 to 4 easterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist at first. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist in the morning and at night. A few showers. Force 2 to 4 south to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy. Mist at first. Occasional showers. Force 2 to 3 south to southeasterly winds, becoming force 4 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
